content: Your answer isn't correct. Resolution 36-NQ/TW is about to get The overseas Vietnamese community has a certain economic potential, has relationships with many foreign and international businesses and economic organizations, has the ability to find partners and acts as a bridge with businesses. , domestic organization. Many intellectuals have a high level of education and expertise; a number of people hold important positions in agencies, research and training institutions, companies and international organizations, able to build relationships with economic and scientific institutions in the host country.
